remarks: Lemma for ~ iseralt .  The terms of an alternating series form a chain of inequalities in alternate terms, so that for example ` S ( 1 ) <_ S ( 3 ) <_ S ( 5 ) <_ ... ` and ` ... <_ S ( 4 ) <_ S ( 2 ) <_ S ( 0 ) ` (assuming ` M = 0 ` so that these terms are defined).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
